Question: NEUCHIPS Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Neuchips Inc

Product: Raptor Gen AI accelerator chip and Evo PCIe accelerator card LLM solutions

- Raptor chip delivers up to 200 tera operations per second (TOPS) per chip, optimized for AI inferencing operations such as Matrix Multiply, Vector, and embedding table lookup
- Evo PCIe card features PCIe Gen 5 with eight lanes and LPDDR5 32GB, achieving 64GB/s host I/O bandwidth and 1.6-Tbps per second of memory bandwidth at just 55 watts per card
- Offers scalability, investment protection, and energy efficiency, reducing hardware costs and electricity usage
- Demonstrated real-time AI capabilities at CES 2024, targeting enterprises looking to access the power of large language models (LLMs) for a wide range of AI applications
Summary_cn:
Neuchips公司

产品：猛禽Gen AI加速芯片和Evo PCIe加速卡的LLM解决方案

- 猛禽芯片在每颗芯片上提供高达200兆次/秒（TOPS）的运算能力，专为AI推理操作进行了优化，如矩阵乘法、向量和嵌入式表格查找
- Evo PCIe卡采用PCIe Gen 5和8个通道，LPDDR5 32GB，实现64GB/s的主机I/O带宽和每秒1.6-Tbps的内存带宽，仅55瓦每张卡
- 提供可伸缩性、投资保护和能源效率，降低硬件成本和电力使用
- 在CES 2024展示了实时AI能力，并针对企业寻求利用大型语言模型（LLMs）的强大能力来开展广泛的AI应用。
